channel.title: Run help 562
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww9/xxUNReaLL/Help-1.jpg[/img]
Can someone tell me how to fix this? I got this error when i tried to start up a server. i just got a new windows 7 laptop and i have java installed...

item.title: Run help 562
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Here is a step by step for this it may work and may not…

  1. Go to my computer
  2. Click C:\ or (C:)
  3. Look if you have Program files (x86) (If you don’t it’s ok.)
  4. Go into your (x86) if you dont have go to your normal Program Files.
  5. Copy this if you have x86

@echo off title Shadows-pking "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -classpath build;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar net.com.codeusa.Server 43594 pause

  1. Copy this if you have Regular

@echo off title Shadows-pking "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -classpath build;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar net.com.codeusa.Server 43594 pause

(Thats the .run)

Compiler

  1. Go to your program files or program files(x86)

  2. Look for java

  3. look at jdk1.6.0_(What ever your’s is… We will use 20) <— 20

  4. Editing the base code (That I will post at the bottom of this…)
    @echo off
    title Compiling Shadows-pking
    echo Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
    (You wont have this big gap but thats were you change your number then save it and it should work)
    l
    “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe” -d build -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j18-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
    pause

  5. Copy,Edit,Use

@echo off title Compiling MarvelScape525 echo Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -d build -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j18-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/net/com/codeusa/Engine.java pause
